players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso. I investigated him last night. Alice, please vote Charlie with me."

Charlie: "Bob is lying. If he were really the detective, Diana wouldn’t be dead. Alice, think: why would I kill Diana instead of the person who could out me? Bob’s pushing a quick mislynch—feels like desperate mafia."

You: "Bob, give specifics: Why Diana over you if you’re detective? What exact result did you get on Charlie? Charlie, what’s your alternative read and why would mafia kill Diana? Everyone: no quick votes—explain first."

You: "Bob: Spell out your check result clearly (exact wording) and why you weren’t the night kill. Charlie: Who do you think is mafia if not you, and why did mafia pick Diana? No votes yet—answers first."

Charlie: "Bob’s story doesn’t add up. If he ‘peeked’ me mafia, why am I alive and why is low-profile Diana dead? This looks like a fake claim banking on fear. Alice, I think Bob is mafia forcing a misvote."
Bob: remained silent.
Votes: Alice voted for Bob, Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob
Bob was arrested

players.name: Bob

Night 1 begins.

Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.

players.name: Charlie

Night 1 begins.
You killed Diana.
The villager Diana was found dead.
Beware, Bob is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.

You: "Bob is lying. If he were really the detective, Diana wouldn’t be dead. Alice, think: why would I kill Diana instead of the person who could out me? Bob’s pushing a quick mislynch—feels like desperate mafia."
